english: It's wrong to deceive people, but worse to deceive yourself.
spanish: Está mal engañar a la gente, pero es aún peor engañarte a ti mismo.

english: Judging from the look of the sky, we may have snow tomorrow.
spanish: Juzgando por el aspecto del cielo, mañana podríamos tener nieve.

english: Just because he likes painting doesn't mean he's good at it.
spanish: Solo porque a él le gusta pintar no significa que sea bueno para ello.

english: Lajos said that three years ago he wanted to live in Szeged.
spanish: Lajos dijo que hace tres años él quería vivir en Szeged.

english: Language is one of the most important inventions of mankind.
spanish: El lenguaje es una de las invenciones más importantes de la humanidad.

english: Lawyers and auto mechanics are the people I trust the least.
spanish: Los abogados y los mecánicos son las personas en que menos confío.

english: Life resembles a novel more often than novels resemble life.
spanish: La vida se asemeja a una novela más a menudo de lo que las novelas se parecen a la vida.

english: Look, I've had a long day and I want to go to bed right now.
spanish: Mira, tuve un día largo y quiero ir a la cama ahora mismo.

english: Looking at your Facebook friends' photos is a waste of time.
spanish: Mirar las fotos de tus amigos en Facebook es una pérdida de tiempo.

english: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the United States.
spanish: Los Ángeles es la segunda ciudad más grande de los Estados Unidos.

english: Many questions came up about the quality of the new product.
spanish: Surgieron muchas preguntas acerca de la calidad del nuevo producto.

english: Mary and her family came to the train station to see us off.
spanish: Mary y su familia vinieron a la estación de tren a vernos partir.

english: Mary and her family came to the train station to see us off.
spanish: Mary y su familia vinieron a la estación de tren a despedirnos.

english: Mary promised her mother that she would help her more often.
spanish: Mary le prometió a su madre que la ayudaría más a menudo.

english: Mary promised her mother that she would help her more often.
spanish: Mary le prometió a su madre que la ayudaría con más frecuencia.

english: My brother didn't have the courage to swim across the river.
spanish: Mi hermano no tuvo el valor para cruzar nadando el río.

english: My father suggested that we go to the movies this afternoon.
spanish: Mi padre sugirió que fuéramos al cine esta tarde.

english: My grandfather doesn't know how to take money out of an ATM.
spanish: Mi abuelo no sabe retirar dinero del cajero automático.

english: My three-year-old daughter asked me to take her to the park.
spanish: Mi hija, de tres años, me pidió que la llevara al parque.

english: My younger brother really likes to take photos of mountains.
spanish: A mi hermano menor realmente le gusta tomar fotografías de la montaña.

english: Newspapers, television, and radio are called the mass media.
spanish: A los periódicos, la televisión y la radio se les llama medios de comunicación masiva.

english: Not all the houses around here were burned down in the fire.
spanish: No todas las casas de por aquí sucumbieron al fuego.

english: On Saturday, we went to the movies and then to a restaurant.
spanish: El sábado fuimos al cine y después al restaurante.

english: On my way here, the strong wind blew my umbrella inside out.
spanish: De camino aquí una fuerte ráfaga de aire me dio la vuelta al paraguas.

english: On my way here, the strong wind blew my umbrella inside out.
spanish: Cuando venía hacia aquí una fuerte ráfaga de aire me dio la vuelta al paraguas.

english: On my way here, the strong wind blew my umbrella inside out.
spanish: Cuando venía hacia aquí una fuerte ráfaga de viento me dio la vuelta al paraguas.

english: On my way here, the strong wind blew my umbrella inside out.
spanish: De camino aquí una fuerte ráfaga de viento me dio la vuelta al paraguas.

english: On weekends, I take my dogs out for a long walk in the park.
spanish: Los fines de semana llevo a mis perros a dar un largo paseo por el parque.

english: One of the children is studying, but the others are playing.
spanish: Uno de los niños estudia, pero los otros juegan.

english: Pizza is the kind of food that fits into today's life style.
spanish: La pizza es el tipo de comida que va con el estilo de vida de hoy.

english: Play your cards right and Tom might invite you to his party.
spanish: Juega bien tus cartas y Tom te podría invitar a su fiesta.

english: Seeing the woman with the yellow hat reminded me of a story.
spanish: Ver a la mujer con el sombrero amarillo me recordó una historia.

english: Seen from a distance, the big rock looks like an old castle.
spanish: Vista de lejos, la roca se ve como un viejo castillo.

english: She advised him to talk about his life in the United States.
spanish: Ella le aconsejó que hablara acerca de su vida en Estados Unidos.

english: She always comforted herself with music when she was lonely.
spanish: Cuando ella se sentía sola, oír música siempre la confortaba.

english: She began writing a report at eight, finishing it at twelve.
spanish: Ella comenzó a escribir un informe a las ocho, terminándolo a las doce.

english: She can tell the most outrageous lie without batting an eye.
spanish: Ella puede soltar la más atroz mentira sin pestañear los ojos.

english: She couldn't fall asleep because she was thinking about him.
spanish: Ella no podía quedarse dormida porque estaba pensando en él.

english: She doesn't have a babysitter, so she can't go to the party.
spanish: Ella no tiene niñera, así que no puede ir a la fiesta.

english: She made me so angry on the telephone that I hung up on her.
spanish: Me hizo enfadar tanto en el teléfono que le colgué.

english: She pooh-poohed the idea with a disdainful wave of her hand.
spanish: Ella desdeñó la idea con un despectivo gesto con la mano.

english: She still loves him even though he doesn't love her anymore.
spanish: Ella todavía lo ama aunque él ya no la ame.

english: She was advised by him not to borrow money from his friends.
spanish: Él le aconsejó que no le pidiera dinero prestado a sus amigos.

english: She'd like him to get in touch with her as soon as possible.
spanish: Ella quisiera que él se pusiera en contacto con ella tan pronto como sea posible.

english: Some people have trouble getting their dogs to eat dog food.
spanish: Algunas personas tienen problemas para hacer que sus perros coman comida para perros.

english: Some people never seem to learn how to think for themselves.
spanish: Algunas personas parecen nunca aprender a pensar por sí mismas.

english: Someone is standing behind the bushes taking pictures of us.
spanish: Alguien está parado atrás del arbusto sacándonos fotos.

english: Sometimes we argue about things that don't matter that much.
spanish: A veces discutimos sobre cosas que no tienen mucha importancia.

english: Strictly speaking, Chinese consists of hundreds of dialects.
spanish: Siendo estrictos, el chino consiste en cientos de dialectos.

english: Take this folding umbrella with you. It might come in handy.
spanish: Toma este paraguas plegable contigo. Podría serte útil.

english: That job wasn't very interesting. However, the pay was good.
spanish: Ese empleo no era muy interesante. Sin embargo, pagaba bien.

english: That matter is the same one that we discussed the other day.
spanish: Ese asunto es el mismo que discutimos el otro día.

english: That village has changed a lot from how it was 10 years ago.
spanish: Ese pueblo ha cambiado mucho de cómo era hace 10 años.

english: That's why some veterans never wanted to talk about the war.
spanish: Es por eso que algunos veteranos nunca quisieron hablar de la guerra.

english: The British commander ordered his men to rest for the night.
spanish: El comandante británico les ordenó a sus hombres que descansaran por la noche.

english: The Christmas party won't be the same this year without Tom.
spanish: La celebración de la Navidad no será igual este año sin Tom.

english: The Socialist Party groomed him as a presidential candidate.
spanish: El Partido Socialista le preparó como candidato presidencial.

english: The United Nations sent troops to intervene in the conflict.
spanish: Las Naciones Unidas mandaron tropas para intervenir en el conflicto.

english: The best way to predict the future is to create it yourself.
spanish: La mejor manera de predecir el futuro es crearlo por ti mismo.

english: The child sat on his mother's lap and listened to the story.
spanish: El niño se sentó en el regazo de su madre y escuchaba la historia.

english: The child was incapable of understanding his father's death.
spanish: El niño no era capaz de comprender la muerte de su padre.

english: The crisis led to the 1968 Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty.
spanish: La crisis llevó al Tratado de No Proliferación Nuclear de 1968.

english: The cushions on the sofa don't match those on the armchairs.
spanish: Los cojines en el sofá no coinciden con los de los sillones.

english: The delay forced us to stay overnight in an expensive hotel.
spanish: El retraso nos forzó a pasar la noche en un hotel caro.

english: The farm production of this year is better than we expected.
spanish: Este año la producción de la granja ha sido mejor que lo esperado.

english: The farm production of this year is better than we expected.
spanish: Este año la producción de la granja ha sido mejor de lo esperado.

english: The heavy snowfall prevented our train from leaving on time.
spanish: La intensa nevada impidió que nuestro tren saliera a tiempo.

english: The home team always have an advantage over their opponents.
spanish: El equipo local siempre tiene ventaja sobre su rival.

english: The horses are coming down the track and it's neck and neck.
spanish: Los caballos atraviesan la pista y van nariz a nariz.

english: The iPad would be a better product if it could handle Flash.
spanish: La iPad sería un mejor producto si pudiera soportar Flash.

english: The letter does not say what time she will come up to Tokyo.
spanish: En la carta no dice cuándo vendrá ella a Tokio.

english: The new library has been under construction since last year.
spanish: La nueva biblioteca se está construyendo desde el año pasado.

english: The old shack seems to have weathered the storm pretty well.
spanish: La vieja choza parece haber resistido la tormenta bastante bien.

english: The only two languages Tom can speak are French and English.
spanish: Los dos únicos idiomas que Tom sabe hablar son inglés y francés.

english: The only website Tom visits at least once a day is this one.
spanish: El único sitio web que Tom visita al menos una vez por día, es este.

english: The origin of the universe will probably never be explained.
spanish: Probablemente nunca sea explicado el origen del universo.

english: The pain she suffered while being tortured was unimaginable.
spanish: Los dolores que ella sufrió durante la tortura son inimaginables.

english: The plane from Chicago arrived at the airport late at night.
spanish: El avión de Chicago llegó al aeropuerto de madrugada.

english: The police carefully investigated the cause of the accident.
spanish: La policía investigó cuidadosamente la causa del accidente.

english: The police conducted an offensive against some drug dealers.
spanish: La policía condujo una redada contra algunos traficantes de droga.

english: The police looked everywhere and could find no trace of Tom.
spanish: La policía buscó por todas partes y no pudo encontrar rastros de Tom.

english: The police ruled out the possibility of suicide in the case.
spanish: La policía rechazó la posibilidad de que ese caso hubiera sido un suicidio.

english: The president and the secretary talked over a cup of coffee.
spanish: El presidente y su secretaria hablaron tomando café.

english: The president gave up the idea because it was not practical.
spanish: El presidente abandonó esa idea por no ser realista.

english: The prevention of forest fires is everyone's responsibility.
spanish: La prevención de los incendios forestales es responsabilidad de todos.

english: The price of my piano lessons includes the use of the piano.
spanish: El precio de las lecciones de piano incluye el uso del piano.

english: The prominent psychologist resembles my uncle in appearance.
spanish: El prominente psicólogo se asemeja a mi tío en aspecto exterior.

english: The robbers came out from behind the trees and attacked him.
spanish: Los ladrones salieron por detrás de los árboles y lo atacaron.

english: The schedule dictates that this work be done by the weekend.
spanish: El horario indica que esta tarea debe estar hecha para el fin de semana.

english: The store where you buy groceries is called a grocery store.
spanish: A la tienda donde compras comestibles se le llama almacén.

english: The structure isn't strong enough to support so much weight.
spanish: La estructura no es lo suficientemente fuerte como para soportar tanto peso.

english: The time may come when people will have used up all the oil.
spanish: Llegará el día en el que se agotará todo el petróleo.

english: The train was ten minutes behind time because of heavy snow.
spanish: A causa de la gran nevada el tren se retrasó diez minutos.

english: The two countries will negotiate a settlement to the crisis.
spanish: Los dos países negociarán una solución a la crisis.

english: The way he spoke attracted the attention of a famous writer.
spanish: La manera en la que habló llamó la atención de un famoso escritor.

english: The witness did not seem nervous when he spoke at the trial.
spanish: El testigo no parecía estar nervioso cuando testificó en el juicio.

english: The worst loneliness is to not be comfortable with yourself.
spanish: La peor soledad es no sentirte a gusto contigo mismo.

english: There used to be a small bridge over the river 10 years ago.
spanish: Solía haber un pequeño puente sobre el río hace 10 años.

english: There was no other choice but to abandon the entire project.
spanish: No hubo más opción, que renunciar al proyecto completo.

english: There were many things that Tom wanted to do before he died.
spanish: Hay muchas cosas que Tom espera hacer antes de morir.

english: There were many who couldn't recognize him in that disguise.
spanish: Hubo muchos que no lo pudieron reconocer con ese disfraz.

english: There's no danger of this lamp setting fire to the curtains.
spanish: No hay peligro de que esta lámpara prenda fuego a las cortinas.

english: They bought a few pieces of furniture when they got married.
spanish: Ellos compraron algunos muebles cuando se casaron.

english: They sleep in separate bedrooms even though they're married.
spanish: A pesar de estar casados, duermen en cuartos separados.

english: They were clearing the snow from the sidewalk with a shovel.
spanish: Ellos estaban limpiando la nieve de la vereda con una pala.

english: Thirteen is a lucky number in the Brazilian Federal Lottery.
spanish: El trece es un número de la suerte en la Lotería Federal Brasileña.

english: This is a sentence, that has the syllable count, of a haiku.
spanish: Esta es una frase con el conteo de sílabas de un haiku.

english: This is the coldest winter that we have had in thirty years.
spanish: Este es el invierno más frío que tuvimos en treinta años.

english: This is the first time I've ever eaten store-bought cookies.
spanish: Esta es la primera vez que como galletas compradas en una tienda.

english: This is the same old problem we've had the past three years.
spanish: Este es el mismo problema que nosotros hemos tenido los últimos tres años.

english: This might not have anything to do with the problem at hand.
spanish: Puede que eso no tenga nada que ver con nuestro problema.

english: This room is too hot to study in. I can't stand it any more.
spanish: En esta habitación hace demasiado calor para estudiar. No lo aguanto más.

english: Thousands of dead fish have been found floating in the lake.
spanish: Miles de peces muertos fueron encontrados flotando en el lago.

english: Three of the men involved in the accident were hospitalized.
spanish: Tres de los hombres implicados en el accidente fueron hospitalizados.

english: Tired from the hard work, he went to bed earlier than usual.
spanish: Cansado del duro trabajo, él se fue a la cama más temprano de lo usual.

english: To determine its origin, we must go back to the middle ages.
spanish: Debemos volvernos a la edad media para rastrear su origen.

english: To tell the truth, that film was not very interesting to me.
spanish: A decir verdad la película no me pareció muy interesante.

english: Tom advised us to leave early and avoid the morning traffic.
spanish: Tom nos aconsejó que saliéramos temprano para evitar el tráfico de la mañana.

english: Tom always checks the caller ID before he answers the phone.
spanish: Tom siempre comprueba la identidad de quien llama antes de responder al teléfono.

english: Tom and Mary couldn't go on a picnic because it was raining.
spanish: Tom y Mary no pudieron ir de picnic porque estaba lloviendo.

english: Tom and Mary exchange more than 200 text messages every day.
spanish: Tom y Mary intercambian más de 200 textos cada día.

english: Tom apparently didn't want to go to Mary and John's wedding.
spanish: Aparentemente, Tom no quería ir a la boda de Mary y John.

english: Tom asked me if I would be willing to contribute some money.
spanish: Tom me preguntó si acaso estaría dispuesto a contribuir algo de dinero.

english: Tom believes that the universe really has eleven dimensions.
spanish: Tom cree que el universo de verdad tiene once dimensiones.

english: Tom believes that these quartz crystals have healing powers.
spanish: Tom cree que esos cristales de cuarzo tienen poderes curativos.

english: Tom called Mary to apologize to her, but she hung up on him.
spanish: Tom llamó a Mary para disculparse, pero le colgó.

english: Tom called her Mary even though that wasn't really her name.
spanish: Tom la llamaba Mary a pesar de no ser ese su verdadero nombre.

english: Tom came from a family who didn't talk about their feelings.
spanish: Tom venía de una familia que no hablaba acerca de sus sentimientos.

english: Tom can go hear Mary sing at that club whenever he wants to.
spanish: Tom puede ir a escuchar cantar a Mary al club siempre que él quiera.

english: Tom can speak French almost as well as he can speak Spanish.
spanish: Tom puede hablar francés casi tan bien como puede hablar español.

english: Tom can't remember exactly when he first met Mary's parents.
spanish: Tom no se acuerda de cuándo exactamente conoció a los padres de Mary.

english: Tom claimed that he saw a man being eaten alive by piranhas.
spanish: Tom alegó haber visto a un hombre devorado vivo por pirañas.

english: Tom could think of no reason why he needed to go home early.
spanish: Tom no podía pensar en ningún motivo por el que necesitara regresar temprano a casa.

english: Tom didn't go to school yesterday because he didn't want to.
spanish: Tom no fue ayer a la escuela porque no quería.

english: Tom didn't know that Mary was interested in classical music.
spanish: Tom no sabía que Mary estuviera interesada en la música clásica.

english: Tom didn't want anyone to know that he had been dating Mary.
spanish: Tom no quería que nadie supiera que él había estado saliendo con María.

english: Tom divorced Mary after the children graduated from college.
spanish: Tom se divorció de Mary después de que los niños salieran de la universidad.

english: Tom doesn't know how to say what he wants to say in English.
spanish: Tom no sabe decir lo que quiere decir en inglés.

english: Tom doesn't know if he will be able to visit us next Monday.
spanish: Tom no sabe si nos podrá visitar el próximo lunes.

english: Tom doesn't think that Mary did all her homework by herself.
spanish: Tom no cree que Mary haya hecho toda la tarea ella sola.

english: Tom doesn't think that Mary did all her homework by herself.
spanish: Tom no cree que Mary haya hecho sola todos sus deberes.

english: Tom gave me a couple of slices of toast and a glass of milk.
spanish: Tom me dio un par de trozos de pan y un vaso de leche.

english: Tom got to work later than usual this morning. I wonder why.
spanish: Tom fue a trabajar más tarde de lo normal. Me pregunto por qué.

english: Tom hadn't eaten anything the whole day and was very hungry.
spanish: Tom no había comido nada en todo el día y estaba muy hambriento.

english: Tom has a cast iron stomach. He can eat just about anything.
spanish: Tom tiene un estómago a prueba de bombas. Puede comer casi cualquier cosa.

english: Tom has a reputation of never listening to anybody's advice.
spanish: Tom tiene reputación de jamás escuchar el consejo de nadie.

english: Tom has two sons. One is a doctor and the other is a lawyer.
spanish: Tom tiene dos hijos. Uno es médico y el otro es abogado.

english: Tom is afraid because he doesn't understand what's going on.
spanish: Tom tiene miedo porque no entiende qué está pasando.

english: Tom is the only person that has any chance to persuade Mary.
spanish: Tom es la única persona que tiene alguna posibilidad de persuadir a Mary.

english: Tom is very sleepy, because he didn't sleep well last night.
spanish: Tom tiene mucho sueño porque anoche no durmió bien.

english: Tom knows why Mary decided not to go on the picnic with him.
spanish: Tom sabe por qué Mary decidió no ir al picnic con él.

english: Tom said he was going to try out for his school soccer team.
spanish: Tom dijo que iba a dar la prueba para el equipo de fútbol de su escuela.

english: Tom said that he'd never eaten such a delicious meal before.
spanish: Tom dijo que no había comido nunca un plato tan delicioso.

english: Tom says he can make a decent living as a sidewalk musician.
spanish: Tom dice que puede llevar una vida decente como músico callejero.

english: Tom says that he and Mary will spend Christmas Day together.
spanish: Tom dice que él y Mary pasarán juntos el día de Navidad.

english: Tom says that he has no trouble understanding Mary's French.
spanish: Tom dice que no tiene problemas para entender el francés de Mary.

english: Tom says that he has to go to Boston the day after tomorrow.
spanish: Tomás dice que tiene que ir a Boston pasado mañana.

english: Tom sometimes sees Mary on the street in front of his house.
spanish: Tom a veces ve a Mary en la calle al frente de su casa.

english: Tom stared into the impenetrable blackness of the night sky.
spanish: Tom miraba la oscuridad impenetrable del cielo nocturno.

english: Tom thinks his country is the greatest country in the world.
spanish: Tom cree que su país es el mejor del mundo.

english: Tom told her that he had written that poem two years before.
spanish: Tom le dijo que había escrito ese poema dos años antes.

english: Tom took Mary to the hospital on the back of his motorcycle.
spanish: Tom llevó a María al hospital en la parte trasera de su motocicleta.

english: Tom took the CD from its case and inserted it in the player.
spanish: Tom sacó el CD de su caja y lo puso en el reproductor.

english: Tom wanted Mary to understand why he couldn't live with her.
spanish: Tom quiere que Mary comprenda por qué no podría vivir con ella.

english: Tom wanted to do it this afternoon, but I begged him not to.
spanish: Tom quería hacerlo esta tarde, pero le rogué que no.

english: Tom wanted to study Japanese with a native Japanese speaker.
spanish: Tom quería estudiar japonés con un hablante nativo.

english: Tom was sitting at the bar three stools away, drinking beer.
spanish: Tom estaba sentado en el bar alejado 3 taburetes y bebiendo cerveza.

english: Tom was surprised to see how skimpy Mary's new swimsuit was.
spanish: Tom se sorprendió al ver cuán poco le cubría a Mary su nuevo bañador.

english: Tom was the first person in our neighborhood to buy an iPad.
spanish: Tom fue la primera persona en comprar un Ipad en nuestro vecindario.

english: Tom was too busy worrying about Mary to worry about himself.
spanish: Tom estaba demasiado ocupado preocupándose por Mary para preocuparse por sí mismo.

english: Tom's drinking has caused a lot of problems in his marriage.
spanish: El alcoholismo de Tom ha causado muchos problemas en su matrimonio.

english: Tom's lost a lot of blood, but he hasn't lost consciousness.
spanish: Tom ha perdido mucha sangre, pero no ha perdido el conocimiento.

english: Turn the Christmas tree lights off when you leave the house.
spanish: Apaga las luces del árbol de Navidad cuando salgas de casa.

english: U.S.S.R. stands for the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.
spanish: U.R.S.S. significa Unión de Repúblicas Socialistas Soviéticas.

english: Unfortunately, Tom was in the wrong place at the wrong time.
spanish: Desafortunadamente, Tom estaba a la hora equivocada en el lugar equivocado.

english: We can run away from everything, except from our conscience.
spanish: Podemos huir de todo, excepto de nuestra conciencia.

english: We decided not to have peace negotiations with the invaders.
spanish: Nosotros decidimos no tener negociaciones de paz con los invasores.

english: We don't like our neighbors, and they don't like us, either.
spanish: No nos gustan nuestros vecinos, y a ellos tampoco les gustamos nosotros.

english: We have a long and cold winter, but we know how to enjoy it.
spanish: Tenemos un invierno largo y frío, pero sabemos disfrutarlo.

english: We have a magnificent view of the ocean from our hotel room.
spanish: Tenemos una magnífica vista al mar desde nuestra habitación de hotel.

english: We should appeal to reason instead of resorting to violence.
spanish: Deberíamos apelar al sentido común en vez de recurrir a la violencia.

english: We use gestures as well as words to communicate with others.
spanish: Usamos tanto gestos, como palabras, para comunicarnos con los demás.

english: We'll go to Hong Kong first, and then we'll go to Singapore.
spanish: Vamos a ir a Hong Kong primero, y luego iremos a Singapur.

english: We've got to get up early tomorrow. We're going on a picnic.
spanish: Tenemos que levantarnos temprano mañana. Nos vamos de picnic.

english: What happened to the girl you were sharing the bedroom with?
spanish: ¿Qué le pasó a la chica con la que estabas compartiendo dormitorio?

english: What image did you have in mind as you painted this picture?
spanish: ¿Qué imagen tenías en mente cuando pintaste este cuadro?

english: What makes you think that Tom prefers living in the country?
spanish: ¿Qué te hace pensar que Tom prefiere vivir en el campo?

english: What you see above the water is just the tip of the iceberg.
spanish: Lo que se ve sobre la superficie del mar no es más que la punta de un iceberg.

english: What's the best way to stop your children becoming atheists?
spanish: ¿Cuál es la mejor manera de evitar que tus hijos se vuelvan ateos?

english: When I was a kid, we used to play hide and seek quite a lot.
spanish: Cuando era niño, solíamos jugar bastante al escondite.

english: When are you going to tell Tom that you want to get married?
spanish: ¿Cuándo vas a decirle a Tom que quieres casarte?

english: When there's a piano to be moved, don't reach for the stool.
spanish: Cuando haya que mover el piano, no te vayas para el taburete.

english: Where's your favorite place to go when you want to be alone?
spanish: ¿Cuál es tu lugar preferido para ir cuando querés estar sola?

english: Why didn't you come yesterday? I waited a long time for you.
spanish: ¿Por qué no viniste ayer? Te esperé mucho rato.

english: Why haven't you told Tom when and where the meeting will be?
spanish: ¿Por qué no le has dicho a Tom cuándo y dónde va a ser la reunión?

english: Why haven't you told Tom when and where the meeting will be?
spanish: ¿Por qué no le has dicho a Tom cuándo y dónde será la reunión?

english: Will you please explain to me the exact meaning of the word?
spanish: ¿Me explicarías el significado exacto de la palabra, por favor?

english: With the bridge destroyed, there was nothing to do but swim.
spanish: Con el puente destruido, no quedaba nada más que hacer que nadar.

english: With your talent, you should be able to make a lot of money.
spanish: Con tu talento, deberías ser capaz de conseguir mucho dinero.

english: Write the amount on the check in letters as well as figures.
spanish: Escribe la cantidad en el cheque en letras así como en cifras.

english: You are bound to regret it in future if you are so lazy now.
spanish: Si eres tan perezoso ahora tu destino será lamentarlo en el futuro.

english: You can lie to everyone else, but you can't lie to yourself.
spanish: Puedes mentir a todos los demás, pero no puedes mentirte a ti mismo.

english: You can't fight a good fight with such a defeatist attitude.
spanish: No puedes dar una buena pelea con una actitud tan pesimista.

english: You don't realize its value until you have lost your health.
spanish: No es sino hasta que pierdes la salud que te das cuenta de su valor.

english: You don't realize its value until you have lost your health.
spanish: No aprecias tu salud hasta que la pierdes.

english: You get paid in proportion to the amount of the work you do.
spanish: Eres pagado en proporción a la cantidad de trabajo que hagas.

english: You must have a driver's license before you can drive a car.
spanish: Usted debe tener una licencia de conductor antes de conducir un auto.

english: You ought not to have kept her waiting on such a cold night.
spanish: Tú no debiste haberla tenido esperando en una noche tan fría.

english: You ought not to have kept her waiting on such a cold night.
spanish: No deberías haberla tenido esperando en una noche tan fría.

english: You should concentrate on one thing and learn to do it well.
spanish: Deberías concentrarte en una cosa y aprender a hacerla bien.

english: You should go ahead and do it, just like you said you would.
spanish: Deberías ir y hacerlo, tal como dijiste que harías.

english: You should not despise a man just because he is poorly paid.
spanish: No debes despreciar a un hombre solo porqué esté mal pagado.

english: You should try to form the habit of using your dictionaries.
spanish: Deberías tratar de hacerte el hábito de usar tus diccionarios.

english: You will have guessed its meaning by the end of the chapter.
spanish: Vas a haber adivinado su significado para el final del capítulo.

english: You'd be amazed how many times I've told Tom not to do that.
spanish: Te sorprendería saber todas las veces que le he dicho ha Tom que no haga eso.

english: You'll make the same mistake if things continue in this way.
spanish: Vas a cometer el mismo error si las cosas continúan como van.

english: You're not expected to do anything we wouldn't do ourselves.
spanish: No hace falta que hagas lo que nosotros no haríamos.

english: You've made remarkable progress in English in the past year.
spanish: Tú has hecho notables progresos en inglés en el último año.

english: "What's going on in the cave? I'm curious." "I have no idea."
spanish: "¿Qué habrá en la cueva? Tengo curiosidad." "No tengo ni idea."

english: "What's going on in the cave? I'm curious." "I have no idea."
spanish: "¿Qué está pasando en la cueva? Estoy curioso." "No tengo ni idea."

english: "You must be tired after a long day." "No, not in the least."
spanish: "Debes estar cansado después de un largo día." "No, en lo más mínimo."

english: A friend of mine is looking for someone who can speak French.
spanish: Un amigo mío está buscando a alguien que sepa hablar francés.

english: A white-haired man was playing an accordion outside the shop.
spanish: Un hombre de pelo blanco tocaba el acordeón afuera de la tienda.

english: After his bankruptcy, he wasn't able to get back on his feet.
spanish: Después de la bancarrota no pudo levantar cabeza.

english: After much debate, we decided to spend our holidays in Spain.
spanish: Luego de muchos debates, decidimos pasar nuestras vacaciones en España.

english: After the Christmas party was over, we all went out caroling.
spanish: Cuando se terminó la celebración de Navidad, todos salimos a cantar villancicos.

english: All the competitors are trying to get their piece of the pie.
spanish: Todos los competidores están intentando coger su parte del pastel.

english: Although they were brothers, they were not on speaking terms.
spanish: Aunque eran hermanos no se hablaban.

english: American bombers attacked Japan's largest cities with napalm.
spanish: Los bombarderos americanos atacaron las ciudades más grandes del Japón con el napalm.

english: Are you aware that Okinawa is closer to China than to Honshu?
spanish: ¿Estás consciente de que Okinawa está más cerca de China que a Honshu?

english: As a rule, Japanese people are not good at foreign languages.
spanish: En general, a los japoneses no se les dan bien las lenguas extranjeras.

english: At first he had trouble adjusting to living in his new house.
spanish: En un comienzo, él tuvo problemas acostumbrándose a vivir en su nueva casa.

english: Because of a shortage of work, half the staff was discharged.
spanish: Debido a la escasez de trabajo, la mitad del personal fue dada de baja.

english: Brazil is surrounded by ten countries and the Atlantic Ocean.
spanish: Brasil está rodeado por diez países y por el océano Atlántico.

english: Cancer can be cured easily if it is found in its first phase.
spanish: El cáncer puede ser curado con facilidad si es diagnosticado en la primera fase.

english: Corn is the most highly subsidized crop in the United States.
spanish: El maíz es el cultivo más subsidiado en Estados unidos.

english: Delegates from many countries participated in the conference.
spanish: Delegados de muchos países participaron en la conferencia.

english: Delivery of goods is done after a month of placing the order.
spanish: El envío de los productos se realiza posterior a un mes de hecha la orden.

english: Didn't you tell me yesterday that you wouldn't be late today?
spanish: ¿Acaso no me dijiste ayer que hoy no llegarías tarde?

english: Do you spend more time with your friends or with your family?
spanish: ¿Pasas más tiempo con tu familia o con tus amigos?

english: Do you think it's dangerous to eat genetically modified food?
spanish: ¿Tú crees que es peligroso comer comida modificada genéticamente?

english: Don't ask me for forgiveness. What's been done has been done.
spanish: No me pidas disculpas. Lo hecho, hecho está.

english: Don't go near the bulldog. You wouldn't want him to bite you.
spanish: No te acerques al bulldog; no querrás que te muerda.

english: Don't listen to Tom. He doesn't know what he's talking about.
spanish: No escuches a Tom. Él no sabe de qué está hablando.

english: Don't punish him for breaking the window. He is not to blame.
spanish: No lo castiguen por romper la ventana. Él no es culpable.

english: During the first year of his research, he learned he had ALS.
spanish: El primer año de su investigación se enteró de que tenía esclerosis lateral amiotrófica.

english: Each team carried their flag into the stadium for the finals.
spanish: Para la final, cada equipo trajo su bandera al estadio.

english: Even if I have to sell my house, I'll keep my business going.
spanish: Voy a mantener mi negocio andando aún si tengo que vender mi casa.

english: Even though we know smoking is unhealthy, people still smoke.
spanish: A pesar de que sabemos que fumar es perjudicial, la gente continúa fumando.

english: Every nation, rich or poor, has its strengths and weaknesses.
spanish: Toda nación, rica o pobre, tiene sus fortalezas y sus debilidades.

english: Everyone looks the same, except the one standing on his head.
spanish: Todos parecen iguales excepto el que está haciendo el pino.

english: Everyone looks the same, except the one standing on his head.
spanish: Todos parecen iguales menos el que está haciendo el pino.

english: Everything happened very quickly and it was all very strange.
spanish: Todo ocurrió muy rápido y fue muy extraño.

english: First of all, he is very worried about his daughter's health.
spanish: Primero que todo, él está muy preocupado por la salud de su hija.

english: First, I don't have any money. Second, I don't have the time.
spanish: Primero, no tengo nada de dinero. Segundo, no tengo tiempo.

english: For your own safety, never ride in a car with a drunk driver.
spanish: Por tu propia seguridad, nunca te subas a un auto con un conductor borracho.

english: Great care has been taken to use only the finest ingredients.
spanish: Se ha tomado sumo cuidado en usar solo los más finos ingredientes.

english: Had he known the facts, the accident might have been avoided.
spanish: Si él hubiera conocido los hechos, el accidente se podría haber evitado.

english: Have you heard that a burglar broke into my neighbor's house?
spanish: ¿Has oído que un ladrón entró en la casa de mi vecino?

english: He apologized for his rudeness, but she wouldn't forgive him.
spanish: Él pidió disculpas por su conducta, pero ella no lo perdonaría.

english: He arrived half an hour late, so everyone was angry with him.
spanish: Llegó media hora más tarde, así que todos se enojaron con él.

english: He entered the business world instead of going on to college.
spanish: Él entró al mundo de los negocios en lugar de ir a la universidad.

english: He is in love with her, but he tries to conceal his feelings.
spanish: Está enamorado de ella pero intenta ocultar sus sentimientos.

english: He is working hard in order to pass the entrance examination.
spanish: Está trabajando duro para aprobar el examen de ingreso.

english: He kept saying to himself that he must not tell so many lies.
spanish: Él seguía repitiéndose que no debía decir tantas mentiras.

english: He was ignorant of the fact that the town had been destroyed.
spanish: Ignoraba el hecho de que la ciudad había sido destruida.

english: He was kind enough to take us over to the island in his boat.
spanish: Él fue muy amable en llevarnos a la isla en su bote.

english: He was so busy that he sent his son instead of going himself.
spanish: Él estaba tan ocupado que envió a su hijo en vez de ir él mismo.

english: He's an accredited representative of the Canadian government.
spanish: Es un representante acreditado del gobierno canadiense.

english: Her brother nearly died in a traffic accident nine years ago.
spanish: Su hermano casi muere en un accidente de tráfico hace seis meses.

english: Her library has 3,500 books and includes many first editions.
spanish: Su biblioteca tiene 3.500 libros e incluye muchas primeras ediciones.

english: How long does it take to get from here to your house on foot?
spanish: ¿Cuánto se tarda de aquí a tu casa a pie?

english: How long does it take to get from here to your house on foot?
spanish: ¿Cuánto se tarda en ir desde aquí hasta tu casa andando?

english: How many gifts do you think she received last holiday season?
spanish: ¿Cuántos regalos crees que recibió ella la temporada navideña pasada?

english: How many people did you buy Christmas presents for this year?
spanish: ¿Para cuántas personas has comprado regalos navideños este año?

english: How many suicides do you think there are every year in Japan?
spanish: ¿Cuántos suicidios crees que ocurren al año en Japón?

english: How many times do I have to tell you to stop calling me that?
spanish: ¿Cuántas veces tengo que decirte que dejes de llamarme así?

english: How to deal with environmental pollution is a serious matter.
spanish: Cómo controlar la contaminación ambiental es un problema serio.

english: I am sorry that I haven't written to you in such a long time.
spanish: Lamento no haberte escrito desde hace tanto tiempo.

english: I anticipate that there will be problems on their expedition.
spanish: Preveo que ellos tendrán problemas en la expedición.

english: I assure you that an error like this will never happen again.
spanish: Te aseguro que un error así no sucederá nunca más.

english: I ate half the apple before I noticed there was a worm in it.
spanish: Me comí media manzana antes de darme cuenta de que había un gusano dentro.

english: I can't stand it here any longer. I need a change of scenery.
spanish: Ya no soporto seguir aquí. Necesito un cambio de aires.

english: I can't tell you how happy I am that you've come to visit us.
spanish: No puedo expresarte lo feliz que estoy de que hayas venido a visitarnos.

english: I can't tell you how happy I am that you've come to visit us.
spanish: No tengo palabras para decirte cuan feliz estoy de que hayas venido a vernos.

english: I didn't want to hurt your feelings, and I regret that I did.
spanish: Lo lamento, no quise herir tus sentimientos.

english: I do not like tea, so I generally drink coffee for breakfast.
spanish: No me gusta el té, por lo que normalmente tomo café en el desayuno.

english: I don't know why Tom didn't come and I don't want to ask him.
spanish: No sé por qué Tom no vino y no quiero preguntarle.

english: I don't think Tom will be able to walk for two or three days.
spanish: No creo que Tom pueda caminar durante dos o tres días.

english: I don't want to do it because it's dangerous and it's stupid.
spanish: No quiero hacerlo porque es peligroso y tonto.

english: I doubt that Tom would ever consider selling his antique car.
spanish: Dudo que Tom considerara alguna vez vender su auto antiguo.

english: I doubt that our new boss will be any worse than the old one.
spanish: Dudo que nuestro nuevo jefe vaya a ser peor que el anterior.

english: I drank too much and the ground seemed to spin under my feet.
spanish: Yo bebí mucho y el suelo parecía girar bajo mis pies.

english: I feel sad when I think about all the people who die in wars.
spanish: Me siento muy triste cuando pienso en toda la gente que muere en las guerras.

english: I figured you wouldn't want to drink coffee so late at night.
spanish: Supuse que no querrías beber café tan tarde por la noche.

english: I finally received the call I had been waiting for for weeks.
spanish: Por fin recibí la llamada que llevaba semanas esperando.

english: I found something out about Tom that I think you should know.
spanish: He descubierto algo sobre Tom que creo que deberías saber.

english: I guess it's impossible for me to learn how to play the oboe.
spanish: Supongo que es imposible que yo aprenda a tocar el oboe.

english: I have a lot of work to finish up before the end of the week.
spanish: Tengo mucho trabajo que terminar para el fin de semana.

english: I have to go to the store to buy some shampoo and toothpaste.
spanish: Tengo que ir a la tienda a comprar champú y dentífrico.

english: I hear it takes time to make friends with the English people.
spanish: Oí que toma tiempo hacerse amigo de personas inglesas.

english: I intend to devote a few hours a day to the study of English.
spanish: Pretendo dedicar un par de horas al día a estudiar inglés.

english: I know him by sight, but I have never actually spoken to him.
spanish: Lo conozco de vista, pero la verdad es que nunca le he hablado.

english: I lost no time in visiting my aunt in the hospital yesterday.
spanish: No tuve tiempo de ir al hospital a ver a mi tía.

english: I met so many people that I do not even remember their faces.
spanish: Estuve con tanta gente que ni siquiera me acuerdo de sus caras.

english: I must apologize for not having written for such a long time.
spanish: Debo disculparme por no haber escrito durante tanto tiempo.

english: I put my fingers in my ears to block out the terrible sounds.
spanish: Me metí los dedos en las orejas para tapar esos ruidos terribles.

english: I should have tried out this electric razor before buying it.
spanish: Debería haber probado esta máquina de afeitar antes de comprarla.

english: I still have a headache, but I'm feeling better this morning.
spanish: Aún tengo un dolor de cabeza, pero me estoy sintiendo mejor esta mañana.

english: I suppose you want to ask me where I was yesterday afternoon.
spanish: Supongo que quieres preguntarme dónde estuve ayer por la tarde.

english: I think it's time for me to show you how to do that properly.
spanish: Creo que es hora de que te enseñe cómo se hace bien.

english: I thought we had agreed you weren't going to do that anymore.
spanish: Pensé que habíamos acordado que no harías más eso.

english: I took a cooking class last spring and learned to bake bread.
spanish: En primavera del año pasado fui a clases de cocina y aprendí a hornear pan.

english: I tried to find out how many people really live in this town.
spanish: Traté de averiguar cuántas personas viven realmente en esta ciudad.

english: I want to find out if Tom is going to go out and eat with us.
spanish: Quiero averiguar si Tom va a salir a comer con nosotros.

english: I want to make a phone call, but I don't have any change now.
spanish: Quiero hacer una llamada, pero no ando con cambio.

english: I want to make a phone call, but I don't have any change now.
spanish: Quiero hacer una llamada, pero ahora no tengo suelto.

english: I was able to find the street, but I couldn't find her house.
spanish: Pude encontrar la calle, pero no encontrar su casa.

english: I was trying to say something when you so rudely interrupted.
spanish: Estaba tratando de decir algo cuando vos tan groseramente interrumpiste.

english: I was wondering if you'd let me stay with you for a few days.
spanish: Me preguntaba si me dejarías quedarme contigo un par de días.

english: I went to the department store to do some shopping yesterday.
spanish: Ayer fui al gran almacén a hacer unas compras.

english: I wish I could figure out how to disable comments on my blog.
spanish: Me gustaría averiguar cómo desactivar comentarios en mi blog.

english: I'd just like to give you a little history about our project.
spanish: Solo quisiera contarte una pequeña historia acerca de nuestro proyecto.

english: I'd like to know why you didn't finish your homework on time.
spanish: Quisiera saber por qué no hiciste tu tarea a tiempo.

english: I'm getting tired of hearing Christmas music everywhere I go.
spanish: Me estoy empezando a cansar de oír música navideña por donde quiera que voy.

english: I'm going to be around tomorrow afternoon, so please drop in.
spanish: Voy a estar por aquí mañana en la tarde, así que por favor pasa a visitarme.

english: I'm sleepy because I stayed up all night studying for a test.
spanish: Tengo sueño porque estuve levantado toda la noche estudiando para un examen.

english: I've been riding so long I'm starting to smell like my horse.
spanish: He estado montando por tanto tiempo que estoy empezando a oler como mi caballo.

english: I've got to hang up now. Someone is waiting to use the phone.
spanish: Ahora tengo que colgar. Alguien está esperando para usar el teléfono.

english: I've had a headache for three days and I can't get rid of it.
spanish: Hace tres días que tengo dolor de cabeza y no se me va.

english: If I had known that you were here, I would have come at once.
spanish: Si hubiese sabido que estabas aquí, habría venido inmediatamente.

english: If I had known that you were here, I would have come at once.
spanish: Si hubiese sabido que estabas aquí, habría venido de inmediato.

english: If Tom had asked me for some money, I'd have given it to him.
spanish: Si Tom me hubiese pedido algo de dinero se lo habría dado.

english: If a relationship has to be a secret, you shouldn't be in it.
spanish: Si una relación se debe mantener en secreto, no deberías meterte en ella.

english: If something sounds too good to be true, then it probably is.
spanish: Si algo parece demasiado bueno para ser cierto, probablemente lo sea.

english: If the medicine isn't working, maybe we should up the dosage.
spanish: Si el medicamento no surte efecto, quizá deberíamos aumentar la dosis.

english: If you allow me to speak, I'll be able to explain everything.
spanish: Si me dejas hablar, podré explicar todo.

english: If you do that, you're going to subject yourself to ridicule.
spanish: Si haces eso, vas a estar sometiéndote al ridículo.

english: If you do that, you're going to subject yourself to ridicule.
spanish: Si haces eso vas a quedar en ridículo.

english: If you feed your dog properly, you can increase his lifespan.
spanish: Si alimentas adecuadamente a tu perro, puedes aumentar su periodo de vida.

english: If you had not eaten so much, you would not be so sleepy now.
spanish: Si no hubieras comido tanto ahora no tendrías tanto sueño.

english: If you leave now, I'm sure you'll be caught in a traffic jam.
spanish: Si te vas ahora seguro que pillas un atasco.

english: If you need a change of pace, why don't you come for a visit?
spanish: Si necesitas un cambio de ritmo, ¿por qué no vienes a visitarnos?

english: If you should have any trouble, don't hesitate to come to me.
spanish: Si tuvieras cualquier problema, no dudes en venir conmigo.

english: If you want something done right, you have to do it yourself.
spanish: Si quieres que algo se haga bien, tienes que hacerlo tú mismo.

english: If you want to do good work, you should use the proper tools.
spanish: Si quieres hacer un buen trabajo, debes usar las herramientas justas.

english: If you're happy, it's best to just leave things how they are.
spanish: Si estás feliz, mejor dejar las cosas como están.

english: In 1978 a peace treaty was concluded between Japan and China.
spanish: En 1978 Japón y China firmaron un tratado de paz.

english: Investigators are running a probe into what caused the crash.
spanish: Los científicos están realizando una investigación para saber lo que causó el accidente.

english: Is it ethical to give him the interview questions in advance?
spanish: ¿Es ético adelantarle las preguntas de la entrevista?

english: It is next to impossible for you to finish the work in a day.
spanish: Es casi imposible que termines el trabajo en un día.

english: It looks like rain. You had better take an umbrella with you.
spanish: Parece que va a llover. Sería mejor que te llevaras un paraguas.

english: It took a long time to bring him around to our point of view.
spanish: Nos costó mucho tiempo conseguir convencerle.

english: It was hard for me to sell my guitar, but I needed the money.
spanish: Fue difícil para mí vender mi guitarra, pero necesitaba el dinero.

english: It was in 1912 that the Titanic sank during her first voyage.
spanish: Fue en 1912 que el Titanic se hundió durante su primer viaje.

english: It was such a hot night that I could not sleep till midnight.
spanish: Fue una noche tan calurosa que no pude dormir hasta medianoche.

english: It was such a powerful explosion that the roof was blown off.
spanish: La explosión fue tan fuerte que el techo salió volando.

english: It will not be long before one out of five people owns a car.
spanish: No pasará mucho tiempo antes de que una de cada cinco personas posea un coche.

english: It won't be easy to find someone capable of taking his place.
spanish: No será sencillo encontrar a alguien calificado para sustituirlo.

english: It's about time the government did something about pollution.
spanish: Era cuestión de tiempo que el gobierno hiciese algo sobre la contaminación.

english: It's best for Tom not to be left alone in that frame of mind.
spanish: Lo mejor para Tom es no dejarlo solo en ese estado de ánimo.

english: It's difficult to help people who can't admit they need help.
spanish: Es difícil ayudar a las personas que no pueden admitir que necesitan ayuda.

english: It's important for us to think about the future of the world.
spanish: Es importante que pensemos en el futuro del mundo.

english: It's only a fifteen minute bus ride from here to the airport.
spanish: Sólo son quince minutos en bus de aquí al aeropuerto.

english: Italo Calvino returned to Italy when he was still just a boy.
spanish: Italo Calvino volvió a Italia cuanto era todavía un niño.

english: Judging from how the sky looks, we'll be having fine weather.
spanish: A juzgar por la apariencia del cielo, vamos a tener buen clima.

english: Just by looking at your face, I know that you have good news.
spanish: Sólo con mirarte a la cara ya sé que traes buenas noticias.

english: Just do what I did when I met Mary. Tell her she's beautiful.
spanish: Simplemente haz lo que yo cuando conocí a Mary. Dile que es preciosa.

english: Lake Titicaca, the biggest lake in South America, is in Peru.
spanish: El lago más grande de América del Sur, el Titicaca, se ubica en Perú.

english: Learning should not be forced. Learning should be encouraged.
spanish: El aprendizaje no debe ser forzado, sino estimulado.

english: Let me give you several other reasons why you should do that.
spanish: Déjame darte varias otras razones por las que deberías hacer eso.

english: Many people were left homeless as a result of the earthquake.
spanish: Mucha gente perdió su vivienda a consecuencia del terremoto.

english: Many students go to Europe for the purpose of studying music.
spanish: Muchos estudiantes van a Europa a estudiar música.

english: Mary felt happy when she learned the results of the election.
spanish: Mary se alegró cuando se enteró de los resultados de las elecciones.

english: Mary is in love with a handsome boy from her class named Tom.
spanish: Mary está enamorada de un apuesto muchacho de su clase llamado Tom.

english: Mental exercise is particularly important for young children.
spanish: El ejercicio mental es particularmente importante para los chiquillos.

english: My brother usually calls me from Chicago on Tuesday evenings.
spanish: Mi hermano me llama de Chicago generalmente el martes por la noche.

english: My grandfather is fond of taking a walk early in the morning.
spanish: A mi abuelo le gusta dar un paseo por la mañana temprano.

english: My grandfather is fond of taking a walk early in the morning.
spanish: A mi abuelo le gusta dar un paseo por la mañana.

english: No sooner had I hung up than the phone started ringing again.

spanish: Cuando se presenta una oportunidad favorable, no la dejo pasar.

spanish: Con el TV encendido, ¿cómo puedes mantener la mente en tus estudios?

spanish: «¿Vas a ir al concierto de Tom?» «Por supuesto que sí.»

spanish: Todas sus esperanzas se desvanecieron cuando perdió a su único hijo en la guerra.
